item.title: Reticulate
item.description: #R-stuido hw<-"Hello World!" hw ## [1] "Hello World!" #python print("Hello World!") ## Hello World! Before even diving into reticulate, it is obvious that R-studio and Python have their differences. It was a difficult transition, but I have come to really enjoy Python. Reticulate allows you to work between R and Python, and an example will be shown below. library(reticulate) library(ggplot2) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ tibble 3.

item.title: Darrell the Dachshund
item.description: All about Darrell Hello world! Here is my dacshund, Darrell, in a cow costume.Darrell is six years old and his favorite things to do include playing fetch, going through the Starbucks drive-thru for puppuccinos, and sleeping inside of the fuzziest blankets he can find. I got Darrell when he was just nine months old, he was dumped in a parking lot and of course I had to take him home with me.
